assignments.description: Add the current loop item's text template to the output text variable for display on the results screen.
assignments.name: Assign_Looped_Item
assignments.label: Assign Looped Item

decisions.description: Decision to check which search parameters were completed, and which were blank.
decisions.name: Which_fields_were_completed
decisions.label: Which fields were completed?

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Choice set to hold Product Category. Used to input Category for search.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: productCategory

loops.description: Loop each member of the Collection Variable of previously found Serialized Products.
loops.name: Loop_Found_Serialized_Products
loops.label: Loop Found Serialized Products

recordLookups.description: Get the Compliance Stores record type to be used in later Get Records'.
recordLookups.name: Get_Record_Type_for_Location
recordLookups.label: Get Record Type for Location

recordLookups.description: Get the Compliance Stores record type to be used in later Get Records'.
recordLookups.name: Get_Record_Type_for_Serialized_Product
recordLookups.label: Get Record Type for Serialized Product

recordLookups.description: Get Records for searches that involve the Energy Networks ID.
recordLookups.name: Get_Serialized_Products_1
recordLookups.label: Get Serialized Products 1

recordLookups.description: Get Records for searches that involve location, category, and type. Only returns items with status of Available or Quarantine - Awaiting Inspection, and only returns the correct record type.
recordLookups.name: Get_Serialized_Products_2
recordLookups.label: Get Serialized Products 2

recordLookups.description: Get Records for searches that involve location and category. Only returns items with status of Available or Quarantine - Awaiting Inspection, and only returns the correct record type.
recordLookups.name: Get_Serialized_Products_3
recordLookups.label: Get Serialized Products 3

recordLookups.description: Get Records for searches that involve location and type. Only returns items with status of Available or Quarantine - Awaiting Inspection, and only returns the correct record type.
recordLookups.name: Get_Serialized_Products_4
recordLookups.label: Get Serialized Products 4

recordLookups.description: Get Records for searches that involve location only. Only returns items with status of Available or Quarantine - Awaiting Inspection, and only returns the correct record type.
recordLookups.name: Get_Serialized_Products_5
recordLookups.label: Get Serialized Products 5

recordLookups.description: Get Records for searches that involve category and type. Only returns items with status of Available or Quarantine - Awaiting Inspection, and only returns the correct record type.
recordLookups.name: Get_Serialized_Products_6
recordLookups.label: Get Serialized Products 6

recordLookups.description: Get Records for searches that involve category only. Only returns items with status of Available or Quarantine - Awaiting Inspection, and only returns the correct record type.
recordLookups.name: Get_Serialized_Products_7
recordLookups.label: Get Serialized Products 7

recordLookups.description: Get Records for searches that involve type only. Only returns items with status of Available or Quarantine - Awaiting Inspection, and only returns the correct record type.
recordLookups.name: Get_Serialized_Products_8
recordLookups.label: Get Serialized Products 8

screens.description: Displays the records from the previous Get Records in a list.
screens.name: ResultsDisplay
screens.label: Results

screens.description: Displays nothing as the user did not search for anything.
screens.name: ResultsDisplayNone
screens.label: Results Display

fields.name: displayResults9
fields.fieldText: No items found. Please search via Energy Networks ID, Location, Category, or Type.

screens.description: Screen to capture the inital search parameters.
screens.name: Search_Screen
screens.label: Search Screen

fields.name: inputType
fields.helpText: Item name/type. E.g. D12X

textTemplates.name: templateRecordDetails
textTemplates.text:
Name

{!CurrentFoundSerializedProduct.SPEN_Type__c}

Energy Networks ID

{!CurrentFoundSerializedProduct.SPEN_Energy_Networks_ID__c}

Manufacturer

{!CurrentFoundSerializedProduct.SPEN_Manufacturer__c}

Current Location

{!CurrentFoundSerializedProduct.SPEN_Location_Name__c}

Status

{!CurrentFoundSerializedProduct.SPEN_Item_Status__c}

Safety Check Due

{!CurrentFoundSerializedProduct.SPEN_Safety_Check_Date__c}

____________________

variables.description: Record varaible to store the current item through the Serialized Products loop.
variables.name: CurrentFoundSerializedProduct

variables.description: Record variable for to store the Location record type for search.
variables.name: RecordTypefromGetRecordTypeforLocation
